snippet: The main opposition party, the Movement for Democratic Change, said that it was withdrawing a court challenge because it did not think it would get a fair hearing.
abstract: Zimbabwe's main opposition party is withdrawing court challenge over disputed election results that gave Pres Robert G Mugabe a commanding victory, saying it does not think it would get a fair hearing.
lead_paragraph: The main opposition party, the Movement for Democratic Change, said that it was withdrawing a court challenge because it did not think it would get a fair hearing.

headline.main: Party Drops Legal Dispute Over Election in Zimbabwe
headline.print_headline: Party Drops Legal Dispute Over Election In Zimbabwe
